term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - primary structure, of a segment of a polypeptide
term.title: primary structure

item.text: The amino acid sequence of the polypeptide chain(s), without regard to spatial arrangement (apart from configuration at the Î±-carbon atom).

notes.item: This definition does not include the positions of disulfide bonds and is therefore not identical with 'covalent structure'.
